file.name: openapi.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: APIClarity BFLA
  version: 0.0.1
  description: APIClarity Plugin API
paths:
  /version:
    get:
      operationId: getVersion
      summary: Get the version of this Plugin
      description: Get the version of this Plugin
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Version of the Plugin
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Version'

  /alert/{eventID}:
    post:
      parameters:
        - name: eventID
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
          in: path
        - name: type
          required: true
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            enum:
              - INFO
              - WARN

      responses:
        '200':
          description: set alert
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                additionalProperties: true

  /event/{eventID}/annotation/{annotation}:
    parameters:
      - name: eventID
        required: true
        schema:
          type: integer
        in: path
      - name: annotation
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        in: path

    get:
      responses:
        '200':
          description: get annotation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                additionalProperties: true
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              properties:
                data:
                  type: string
      responses:
        '200':
          description: get annotation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                additionalProperties: true

  /api/{apiID}/annotation/{annotation}:
    parameters:
      - name: apiID
        required: true
        schema:
          type: integer
        in: path
      - name: annotation
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
        in: path
    get:
      responses:
        '200':
          description: get annotation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                additionalProperties: true
    delete:
      responses:
        '200':
          description: delete annotation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                additionalProperties: true
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              properties:
                data:
                  type: string

      responses:
        '200':
          description: set annotation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                additionalProperties: true

  /events:
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          'application/json':
            schema:
              additionalProperties: true

      responses:
        '200':
          description: set alert
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                additionalProperties: true

  /api/{apiID}:
    get:
      parameters:
        - name: apiID
          required: true
          schema:
            type: integer
          in: path

      responses:
        '200':
          description: set alert
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                additionalProperties: true

components:
  schemas:
    Version:
      type: 'object'
      required: [version]
      properties:
        version:
          type: 'string'
